title: Best of The Program | Guests: Ezra Levant & Artur Pawlowski | 10/19/21
description:
Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins with Pastor Artur Pawlowski to discuss the legal scrutiny Artur has endured for being outspoken against COVID regulations. Former State Trooper Robert LaMay joins Glenn to discuss leaving the police force after over 20 years because of the vaccine mandate. Greg Morris joins to discuss the mask mandate that the Dallas Diocese Catholic Schools announced and the threat of expelling children whose parents oppose the mandate.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
